name: part_012
file: tmp_【#大空スバル４周年】新衣装お披露目！！！！！４周年ありがとうございました！！！！！！！！：NEW 3D COSTUME !!! 4th anniversary Live【ホロライブ】 [n6yep2gl1HY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Oozora Subaru performs a cover of 'Acacia' by BUMP OF CHICKEN to celebrate her 4th anniversary.
Subaru thanks the audience as the live performance concludes.
Ending credits scroll featuring highlights from the 4th-anniversary live stream.
Promotional trailer for 'Sausage Legend 2' featuring Subaru and Koyori.

subtitles.original: ...を比べ ふざけながらいこう
subtitles.english: ...comparing them, let's go while joking around.

subtitles.original: 太陽が沢山あっても歩ける
subtitles.english: Even if there are many suns, I can walk.

subtitles.original: 君と照らす世界が見える
subtitles.english: I can see the world illuminated with you.

subtitles.original: 言えないこと聞かないままで
subtitles.english: Without saying anything, without hearing anything,

subtitles.original: 消えない傷の意味知らないままで
subtitles.english: Without knowing the meaning of the wounds that won't fade,

subtitles.original: でも目が合えば笑えるのさ
subtitles.english: But if our eyes meet, we can laugh.

subtitles.original: 涙を挟んでも
subtitles.english: Even if tears come between us.

subtitles.original: 転んだら手を貸してもらうよりも
subtitles.english: Rather than having you lend a hand when I fall,

subtitles.original: 優しい言葉選んでもらうよりも
subtitles.english: Rather than having you choose kind words for me,

subtitles.original: 隣で 隣で 信じてほしいんだ
subtitles.english: Beside me, beside me, I want you to believe in me.

subtitles.original: どこまでも一緒に行けると
subtitles.english: That we can go together anywhere.

subtitles.original: ついに辿り着くその時
subtitles.english: When we finally arrive,

subtitles.original: 夢の正体に触れる時
subtitles.english: When we touch the true nature of our dreams,

subtitles.original: 必ず近くで一番そばで
subtitles.english: Always nearby, right by your side,

subtitles.original: 君の目に映る景色にいたい
subtitles.english: I want to be in the scenery reflected in your eyes.

subtitles.original: あの輝きを
subtitles.english: That radiance,

subtitles.original: 君に会えたから見えた
subtitles.english: I saw it because I met you.

subtitles.original: あの輝きを確かめに
subtitles.english: To confirm that radiance,

subtitles.original: いこう Oh yeah yeah yeah yeah
subtitles.english: let's go. Oh yeah yeah yeah yeah

subtitles.original: どんな最後が待っていようと
subtitles.english: No matter what end awaits,

subtitles.original: もう離さない手を繋いだよ
subtitles.english: I won't let go anymore, I've held your hand.

subtitles.original: 隣で 隣で 君のそばで
subtitles.english: Beside you, beside you, right by your side,

subtitles.original: 魂がここだよと叫ぶさ
subtitles.english: My soul will shout, "I'm right here!"

subtitles.original: そして理由なき光る時
subtitles.english: And when we shine for no reason,

subtitles.original: 僕らを理由が抱きしめる時
subtitles.english: When a reason embraces us,

subtitles.original: 誰より近くで とびきりで
subtitles.english: Closer than anyone, exceptionally,

subtitles.original: 僕の見たい君を君に伝えたい
subtitles.english: I want to tell you about the "you" I want to see.

subtitles.original: 君がいることを君に伝えたい
subtitles.english: I want to tell you that you are here.

subtitles.original: そうやって始まったんだよ
subtitles.english: That's how it started.

subtitles.original: そうやって始まったんだよ
subtitles.english: That's how it started.

subtitles.original: Oh yeah yeah yeah yeah
subtitles.english: Oh yeah yeah yeah yeah

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 4周年ありがとう！ 君の笑顔が沢山（来年も）見れますように。
subtitles.english: Thanks for the 4th anniversary! May next year bring many more smiles from you!!

subtitles.original: A new legend begins
subtitles.english: A new legend begins

subtitles.original: Draw your Sword
subtitles.english: Draw your Sword

subtitles.original: SAUSAGE LEGEND 2 SUBARU & KOYORI
subtitles.english: SAUSAGE LEGEND 2 SUBARU & KOYORI

subtitles.original: Don't miss it !
subtitles.english: Don't miss it !
